Body: Description: We are installed the agent on the ubuntu machine 22.04 we have successfully installed but it's showing reflecting in console and device, kindly provide prompt support.
Steps to Reproduce Updated: Try to install a Ubuntu client in a environment that has no internet connection.

What We've Learned Updated: The customer has set up a installation on a computer that doesn't have any internet connection.
When installing the client, some packages could not get to the targeted URL links and therefor went on error.
Next Steps Updated: Guiding the customer on how the client installation needs to be performed on UbuntuOS.
